name: adamo-sign-broker-microservice
description: Backend development for Adamo Sign broker Microservice

scripts.build: tsc && mkdir -p dist/assets && cp -R src/assets/* dist/assets/ && mkdir -p dist/application/services/templates && cp -R src/application/services/templates/* dist/application/services/templates/ && mkdir -p dist/i18n/locales && cp -R src/i18n/locales/* dist/i18n/locales/
scripts.zip:dist: rm -rf dist.zip && cd dist && zip -r ../dist.zip * && cd ..
scripts.zip:nodejs: rm -rf nodejs.zip && mkdir -p nodejs && cp -r node_modules nodejs/node_modules && zip -r nodejs.zip nodejs

author: Alvaro Chico
